Civic Innovation Corps 👩‍💻🏛️

Dec 8, 2021

  • civictech
  • episode
  • fellowship
  • coding it forward
  • early career

We are joined by Ariana Soto to talk about the Civic Innovation Corps, a program that connects recent graduates of two or four year institutions, bootcamps, and certificate programs to government service through a 10 week paid internship.
